code: import{columnDelimiter,maxColWidth,adjColWidthThres}from"../Constants";export function parseCSV(cur_instance,data){var parseData=[];var lines=data.split("\n");for(var i=0;i<lines.length;i++){if(lines[i]!==""){var toPush=lines[i].split(columnDelimiter);toPush.forEach(function(str){return str.replace(/^"|"$/g,'');});parseData.push(toPush);}}cur_instance.loadData(parseData);}export function modifyColWidth(width,col){if(width>adjColWidthThres){return maxColWidth;}}
